title: adamin1i
author: adamin1i
created_time: October 13, 2023, 12:53:38 PMLast edit: October 13, 2023, 01:04:45 PM by adamin1i
content: Saying that it is normal for Israel to bomb Gaza, where 2 million civilians live, US President Biden said that it is not right for Turkey, which hosts 10 million Syrian immigrants in its country, to bomb terrorist camps in Northern Syria.  The joke is over.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: You forgot to include some sources, I do not usually follow news regarding Turkey politics. I would not be surprised if that was the case though, that is how politics work, unfortunately, it is a part of the current society full of hypocrisy and lies.It reminds me a bit what happened during the crisis of Soviet weapons in Cuba, It was okey for the western allies to have weapons in Turkey (very close to the Soviet union), however, it was not acceptable for the Soviet Union to arm Cuba, which was very close to the continental United States. Sincerely, I think Turkey may be one of the most eccentric NATO members.

comments.author: G.Seed
comments.body: This is crazy and it goes beyond US interests.This is very probable that the Mossad owns pictures of Biden raping children or something.We are certain, since Epstein scandal that the Mossad works like this.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Quote from: G.Seed on October 14, 2023, 06:39:37 PMThis is crazy and it goes beyond US interests.This is very probable that the Mossad owns pictures of Biden raping children or something.We are certain, since Epstein scandal that the Mossad works like this.So you are implying a foreign intelligence agency has taken control over the presidency of the United States by keeping their most important authority under extortion.I see a couple of problems which such theory, being the most obvious that it is quite improbable a foreign agent has very compromising information to threaten all politicians in Washington who are likely to become president someday. We could argue that those which are not easy to manipulate by the Mossad are attacked or ignored by mainstream media, so cannot be chosen by the masses, but that would also imply the Mossad has control over all mainstream media in the United States.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.created_time: October 16, 2023, 04:59:19 PMLast edit: October 16, 2023, 05:12:25 PM by Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: adamin1i on October 13, 2023, 12:53:38 PMSaying that it is normal for Israel to bomb Gaza, where 2 million civilians live, US President Biden said that it is not right for Turkey, which hosts 10 million Syrian immigrants in its country, to bomb terrorist camps in Northern Syria.  The joke is over.I don't care who is involved the bottom line is that nobody deserves to die if he is innocent of the crime. In most cases, more civilians die in this conflict than even the militants. Ankara has claimed that it has neutralized 58 Kurdish militants but if you closely investigate you will unveil that many of the victims are civilians. Hama killed about 1,400 Israelis most of them innocent civilians and civilians in Gaza don't deserve to die that is why Israel should cease fire. Also, the civilians in northern Syria deserve to live and not be killed like chickens. I don't think we should compare the killings of civilians to the actions of politicians. Joe Biden and Â Tayyip Erdogan are playing politics with the Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militia and the Syrian Kurdish YPG militia. We don't want killings anywhere in the world because humans are equal and civilians should not suffer the consequences of the military Rules of engagement should respected.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: The joke was based less, has no morals and couldn't crack my ribs.Got next episode? Oh damn let go I lost zeal to next already as a caused of boring 1st episode.Next time spice with sauces at least have me a tease.
